TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit NonSerializedAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class NonSerializedAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class NonSerializedAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 指示可序列化類別的欄位不應該序列化。

span.span: Indicates that a field of a serializable class should not be serialized.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當使用或類別來序列化物件，使用可防止欄位正在序列化的屬性。When using the or classes to serialize an object, use the attribute to prevent a field from being serialized. 例如，您可以使用此屬性若要避免敏感性資料的序列化。For example, you can use this attribute to prevent the serialization of sensitive data. 目標物件屬性是可序列化類別的公用和私用欄位。The target objects for the attribute are public and private fields of a serializable class. 根據預設，類別是不可序列化，除非它們被標示有。By default, classes are not serializable unless they are marked with . 在序列化過程預設序列化類別的所有公用和私用欄位。During the serialization process all the public and private fields of a class are serialized by default. 以標記欄位序列化期間會排除。Fields marked with are excluded during serialization. 如果您使用類別來序列化物件，請使用方法來取得相同的功能。If you are using the class to serialize an object, use the class to get the same functionality. 或者，請實作介面，可以明確地控制序列化程序。Alternatively, implement the interface to explicitly control the serialization process. 請注意，類別可實作仍然必須標記為。Note that classes that implement must still be marked with . 若要套用事件類別，設定的屬性位置 欄位中，下列 C# 程式碼所示。To apply the class to an event, set the attribute location to field, as shown in the following C# code. ``` [field:NonSerializedAttribute()] public event ChangedEventHandler Changed; ``` 如果欄位不會序列化，但它仍然要求必須在還原序列化後提供的預設值，您可以建立會提供值，欄位的方法，然後套用方法。If a field is not serialized, but it still requires a default value that must be supplied after deserialization, you can create a method that supplies the field with a value, then apply the to the method. 如需屬性用法的詳細資訊，請參閱[屬性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md). ## Examples 下列範例會示範還原序列化的物件，以標示屬性和行為的欄位，以標示中序列化的物件。The following example demonstrates serialization of an object marked with the attribute, and the behavior of a field marked with the in the serialized object. > [!NOTE] > 程式碼會使用類別來序列化物件。The code uses the class to serialize the object. System.runtime.serialization.formatters.soap.dll，不會載入預設專案中找到的類別。The class is found in the system.runtime.serialization.formatters.soap.dll, which is not loaded by default into a project. 若要執行的程式碼，您必須將 DLL 的參考加入您的專案。To run the code, you must add a reference to the DLL to your project. [!code-cpp[SerializationAttributes#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SerializationAttributes/CPP/s.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[SerializationAttributes#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SerializationAttributes/CS/s.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SerializationAttributes#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SerializationAttributes/VB/s.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.
